mapper.sql: select COMPANY_NO, CREATE_BY, LAST_MODIFY_BY, DELETE_FLAG, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_CODE, REMARK from COMPANY
mapper.select: SELECT company.company_name, company.company_type, company.company_code, company.remark, company.create_date, company.create_id, company.update_id, company.update_date, company.create_by, company.update_by FROM company company WHERE company.company_name = #{companyName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company( company_no, company_name, company_type, company_code, remark, `DELETE_FLAG`, `CREATE_BY`, `LAST_MODIFY_BY`, `CREATE_TIME`, `LAST_MODIFY_TIME`) VALUES( #{companyNo}, #{companyName}, #{companyType}, #{companyCode}, #{remark}, #{deleteFlag}, #{createBy}, #{lastModifyBy}, now(), now() )
